Sentencas: Besides electricity generation, solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) produce a significant amount of waste heat, which needs to be immediately removed to ensure the normal operation of SOFCs.
Titulo: Application of cascading thermoelectric generator and cooler for waste heat recovery from solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: If the waste heat is recovered through bottoming thermal devices, the global efficiency of SOFCs can be improved.
Titulo: Application of cascading thermoelectric generator and cooler for waste heat recovery from solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this study, a new hybrid system mainly consisting of a thermoelectric generator, a thermoelectric cooler and an SOFC is proposed to recover the waste heat from SOFC for performance enhancement.
Titulo: Application of cascading thermoelectric generator and cooler for waste heat recovery from solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The thermodynamic and electrochemical irreversible losses in each component are fully considered.
Titulo: Application of cascading thermoelectric generator and cooler for waste heat recovery from solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: An analytical relationship between the SOFC operating current density and the thermoelectric devices dimensionless electric current is derived, from which the range of SOFC operating current density that permits the thermoelectric devices to effectively work is determined.
Titulo: Application of cascading thermoelectric generator and cooler for waste heat recovery from solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The equivalent power output and efficiency for the hybrid system are specified under different operating current density regions.
Titulo: Application of cascading thermoelectric generator and cooler for waste heat recovery from solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The feasibility and effectiveness are illustrated by comparing the proposed hybrid system with the stand-alone SOFC.
Titulo: Application of cascading thermoelectric generator and cooler for waste heat recovery from solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is found that the power density and efficiency of the proposed system allow 2.3% and 4.6% larger than that of the stand-alone SOFC, respectively.
Titulo: Application of cascading thermoelectric generator and cooler for waste heat recovery from solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Finally, various parametric analyses are performed to discuss the effects of some design and operation parameters on the hybrid system performance.
Titulo: Application of cascading thermoelectric generator and cooler for waste heat recovery from solid oxide fuel cells
